Class ScorableMeal

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.Meal
      • core.ScorableMeal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ScorableMeal>

    public class ScorableMeal
extends Meal
implements java.lang.Comparable<ScorableMeal>
    Class extending Meal to be able to associate a score to meals
